title: Using Heroku as a distributed load testing platform
author: sosedoff
content: readme.md heroku-vegetarun vegeta a distributed load testing tool heroku free. project has goals: explore diffent ways deployapplications heroku platform provide simple tool easily run variousload testing scenarios.usageclone repository:git clone https://github.com/sosedoff/heroku-vegeta.gitcd heroku-vegeta sure heroku cli is working:heroku appscopy example configuration file:cp config.json.example config.json you changes config file, run setup command:./script/setuponce done, can start test:./script/run sure remove test apps you're done:./script/teardownconfigexample configuration testing:{ "nodes": 3, "targets": " https://mywebsite.com", "duration": "30s", "rate": "50"}options:nodes - number heroku applications spawntargets - list urls hitduration - test duration. 10s, 30s, 1m, 5m, etcrate - number requests per second per nodelicense mit license (mit)copyright (c) 2017 dan sosedoff dan.sosedoff@gmail.com
